website_summaries.verdict: An electric skillet that will grill, stew, or roast a large amount of food at once, with a slender profile that perfectly fits your countertop, and was built to last for years to come.
pros: Great for making large dishes, like casseroles and cobblers
cons: Be careful with this model, as its nonstick surface is prone to scratches

customer_reviews.title: Great Skillet
customer_reviews.text: We are very rough on our kitchen appliances, but the Presto Skillet is holding up nicely! We use ours for so many different dishes. It heats evenly, washes up nicely and is a bit more shallow overall so stores well. The shallowness is not in the actual cooking area, but in the legs. They are lower to the counter, so a nice compact piece.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Heacock

customer_reviews.title: Super, super
customer_reviews.text: Super, super, super product. I absolutely love it. Everyone who has visited and experienced the versatility of this pan has purchased one themselves. A "must have" in the kitchen and especially in the RV if you have one.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Romero

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice electric skillet. It was a breeze to assemble the handles and lid top. I absolutely love the size, how fast it heats, and the way it cooks. Had been looking at purchasing an electric skillet for a while, but wasn’t sure of which one to buy. I am so glad I came across this one. It is fabulous!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Love this skillet, can cook my whole meal in one pan. Easy clean up,a blessing.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor F. Meade

customer_reviews.title: my Slimline skillet is one of the best, works great for every job I have thrown ...
customer_reviews.text: Thanks, my Slimline skillet is one of the best,works great for every job I have thrown at it. I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cooking in the garage
customer_reviews.text: I hate the scent of food in the house (don't judge me!!) LOL So, because of that, I do most of my cooking in the garage. This works well especially when I cook Indian dishes. The scent of curry takes quite a while to dissipate. But now, with this skillet, I cook to my heart's content in the garage...the food tastes great and the house does not smell like food!
customer_reviews.author: JalisaStew

customer_reviews.title: terrible quality control
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to get this skillet after reading mostly great reviews. During assembly I discovered that the plastic handles were actually manufactured incorrectly and were too small to fit over the metal mounting brackets. I am a cabinetmaker so probably could have filed the handles down to fit but I thought if they can't even get a basic handle system right what else did they mess up. Skillet is big and looks great but can't do much with it without a way to pick it up. So very disappointed . returning it tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: ladoorhanger

customer_reviews.title: This skillet is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at this deal for a while. Another similar product was for sale around $40. This product meet all I needs. It heat so quickly and even. I use this skillet to fry fish and it works great!. The glass cover is also durable! Now I don't have to worry about to cook fish with the slow gas stove inside the room. I usually place it in the garage or on the deck.
customer_reviews.author: Jia J Shen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: She says it’s the best one she has ever owned! She’s happy, I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice One
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We took it for a week of breakfasts in our little camper. Easy to clean with paper towels...very handy for "Glamping".
customer_reviews.author: Monica Hess

customer_reviews.title: i found this watching a you tube video
customer_reviews.text: this is the best electric skillit ever.it fits a whole fryer at once and uses very little oil.it heats fairly eveny and stays right on temperatur.i was watching a video called A COUNTRY LIFE and she has a bunch of kids and she was using it and i ordered it right then you will LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Jani Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for convenient and quick meals!!
customer_reviews.text: Convenient, easy to clean. So far nothing has stuck to it! With my work schedule I need quick and easy!!!! When I cook things for my family I can cook it all at the same time using this (for example, rather than pulling out the cooked chicken and cooking more while the first batch gets cold). Well worth the price to me.
customer_reviews.author: goodkitty

customer_reviews.title: Assembly required
customer_reviews.text: You had to assemble the handles which is fine, but the handles dont fit. Should have known bc the box looked like it was taped shut a second time (corner tape triangle folded over). Gave me the nice warm feels like I bought an appliance and it was dinged on the side or has a missing part and they stare at you asking of you still want to keep the dinged up product without compensation. Returns and exchanges are sooooo annoying. Will see if I get to at least use the replacement .
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! So easy to use and clean. We are a family of three and it has more than enough room to cook all we need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lower profile is great
customer_reviews.text: I really like the low profile. It increases the distance from the fry pan to the upper cabinet which reduces splatter. It doesn’t seem to heat evenly, there are definite hot spots. I like it though and it’s super easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: This frying pan sticks and at bottom of the pan the coating has come off.  Very badly made.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to cook food. The bottom of the pan's coating came off and all the food sticks. I am trying to send it back but I cannot get you people on the phone or get a pre paid postage to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Works great, just wish it had lid latches.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given five stars if they had included latches for the kid like my kat skillet had....made it easier to store and retrieve. I do like the slimmer profile compared to my last one though.
customer_reviews.author: katydid

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old electric skillet well with a more compact design.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkfan2012

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice skillet. I like the size and the low profile. Fits well in my cupboard. So far, I am pleased with the skillet. It has produced over easy eggs, pancakes and chicken fried steak.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. So easy to clean. No not or cold spots. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans easily
customer_reviews.text: The frying pan cleans easily and the finish is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mulder

customer_reviews.title: Love my New Presto skillet!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it non-stop since I got it! Makes great grilled sandwiches, eggs, bacon, skillet dinners, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than stove top!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Presto National IND 06858 16" Slim Line Electric Skillet to replace a hand me down skillet (that was almost as old I am) that finally broke! Wow...what a difference! Definitely gets hotter than the old one and clean up is a-mazing! Honestly, when it comes to frying, sauteing, browning, etc., this electric skillet comes out. The only time I use my stovetop nowadays is when I'm doing something that requires a saucepan. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan E. L. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great Electric Fry Pan
customer_reviews.text: It is low profile & easy to clean. I used it once & will continue to do so whenever the preparation of food calls for a large fry pan.
customer_reviews.author: bikerdot

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this !! Very light and easy to clean, great size for a family meals and Absolutely love that its super easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: mark gribbin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value & pan.
customer_reviews.text: We love this pan. Easy clean up, it cooks even & non stick is perfect. It has made want to cook again & more!
customer_reviews.author: Swimmom

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity electric skillet
customer_reviews.text: The skillet is large and deep. Makes for easy meal prep. We use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: annette ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems to be a good value
customer_reviews.author: henry schuessler

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this skillet!! It heats perfectly & evenly very quickly every time. Easy to clean as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Saves time and less to clean up.
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to use this to cook many things at once. I got hooked on vacation with family, we used it everyday especially breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L Clapper

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love that it doesn't have legs like the old type.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Caramella

customer_reviews.title: I got it when promised and it was in good condition
customer_reviews.text: this skillet was a gift to others and they said they loved it but it is new so we do not know how it is going to be
customer_reviews.author: Terry James

customer_reviews.title: Fry pan
customer_reviews.text: The reason for the one star is because the temperature control knob became so hot I had to use a cloth to turn it. I was really afraid it was going to melt.
customer_reviews.author: docghill

customer_reviews.title: Handles don’t fit
customer_reviews.text: The wrong handles were sent. Planned on using it for camping this weekend so I’m super irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: I received this product as a wedding present 12 years ago and it stop sticking so I had to discard it but I liked it so much that I had to re-purchase it easy use when making my pancakes lol that’s why I had to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Terry

customer_reviews.title: The size is wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Makes cooking for lots of company sooo much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Heats evenly, great non-stick property, appealing low profile, all at a low price. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Francis

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my mother and she loves it! Her previous pan had the lining chip off. This is an excellent pan for cooking your favorite dish!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Thank for my order
customer_reviews.text: I love it last year I order the same thing in target and now I got one from amazon my husband can’t wait to used it
customer_reviews.author: Biak ku

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room to cook for a house full of boys.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Heats evenly
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Last one I had heated unevenly and this one seems to eat pretty evenly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great skillet great price
customer_reviews.text: This is way better then my old skillet. Love the low profile.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Koutsouros

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Lasts about 5 years before food begins to stick to pan.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with size and performance. Definitely would recommend this item to anyone
customer_reviews.author: lorrine kadlec

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it, he does all of the cooking!
customer_reviews.text: He does the cooking - I do the dishes! Hubby loves the larger size so he can cook more at once and I love the easy clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Isbell

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: amazing pot so far...got it for a friend who is living in a hotel and has been worth the.price..
customer_reviews.author: Charollite

customer_reviews.title: Not a12in skeillet
customer_reviews.text: Was advertised as a 12in electric skillet. It was a16in serving hot pan
customer_reviews.author: Edd Birmingham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pan and holds a lot. No more dirty stove!
customer_reviews.author: Dayle

customer_reviews.title: Works good, I initially struggled to get the handles on ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good, I initially struggled to get the handles on but I realized the instructions were not clear and the handles actually were supposed to slip on then screw on. Very frustrating and ultimately my husband figured it out, but I don't think I should take a start off because he figured it out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Fine Except I Needed Help with the Handles
customer_reviews.text: Very large, very nice electric skillet. For the life of me, I could not loosen the screws to get the handles on. I took it into work and had our handyman guy do it for me. Once it was together, I loved it. Large enough, finally, to make pancakes and not have one run into the other. Very satisfied now that it's together. Do notice, it sits low.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big...
customer_reviews.text: Little bigger than expected, but that's ok. Works great. Use it all the time, not much you can't cook in it
customer_reviews.author: Aimee L. Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Some signs of wear on non-stick coating
customer_reviews.text: This unit is slim and compact and fits in a kitchen drawer nicely. The non-stick is already showing signs of wear. Meh
customer_reviews.author: JPhill

customer_reviews.title: unusable
customer_reviews.text: This was returned. It arrived broken, with a loose piece rattling away somewhere inside the bottom piece. I got another brand at a local bi box store, at half the price, and so far seems to be working well, but only used infrequently. I cannot recommend this, but I may just have gotten a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet  Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: A good, mid class, electric skillet, watch hot handles however
customer_reviews.text: This is a product the performs well for the price point but is not spectacular. After a dozen uses I can say the heating element is even across the pan and it cleans up well. Where Presto needs to improve however is their thermal protection. The handles get hot during use and need to be used carefully if you are draining grease out (after frying bacon for instance). In addition the heating control gets very hot during use. Better thermal protection would allow me to make this a five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: W M Pa

customer_reviews.title: It is versatile
customer_reviews.text: I have used the pan for pepper, onions, and sausage. Breaded pork chops. Haven't used it for breakfast yet. I have two small twin sinks and was amazed that I was able to clean the pan easily due to it's size. The unit does cook a little higher over it's heater coils.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Great for Booster Club
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Booster organization for football games. Great product & love it. It works great to heat up & cook & warm hotdogs for high school football games. I have no idea how we didn't buy this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: got it for pancakes
customer_reviews.text: Heat distribution and control is much better than an electric stove eye, but not as good as a gas stovetop and a flat griddle. Pancakes get more brown in striped portions. I was hoping for more uniform browning. But the pancakes are much better overall than electric stove eye pancakes, so I'm good. One pan for breakfast is great. Next I do eggs and sausage.
customer_reviews.author: WandaB

customer_reviews.title: Have to assemble it on your own
customer_reviews.text: I found it disappointing that I had to assemble the handles and lid handle. The handle broke while I was screwing it on. Very upsetting! I was in desperate need of this skillet while awaiting for my stove to be repaired. I’ve no time to wait for a replacement and cannot leave my house to purchase another. I have to put up with a broken handle now. Can you send a replacement handle while I limp along with the broken one?
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Uneven heating.
customer_reviews.text: The heating is uneven. The center area is significantly cooler than the edges, so I've learned to move food from one part of the skillet to another in order to get an even sear on meat. That's more trouble than its worth. I still find uses for it, though, so it isn't a complete disappointment and it is very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Shenberger

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a great skillet. Nice and roomy, cooks evenly, cleanup is super easy.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Big and works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: This electric skillet heats up quickly and evenly it’s non stick and easy to clean. Excellent value very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: DEB

customer_reviews.title: Super capacity and fast cooking
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge and food cooks really fast! I mostly used it during our kitchen renovation when we couldn’t use the stove. It works so well that I’ll keep using it even now that we have our stove back.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly W.

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for every kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a game changer! Much more even cooking than my stove top and large enough to accommodate extra pancakes, more Bolognese sauce... Well-made and easy to clean. I’ll never be without this!
customer_reviews.author: M R.

customer_reviews.title: Only used once but was very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this skillet. Just what I wanted. It is 16" nice size they are usually to small. Of course being new it cooked perfect fried chicken. Time will tell how it holds up. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Trisco

customer_reviews.title: Heats evenly - no hot spots.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and light weight of this pan. I purchased it as a replacement for an older version that had hot spots and was heavy. This one heats evenly and is easy to handle. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: Super useful, should have bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: I like the smaller footprint for its size. It packs great for camping with no parts easy to break off. Has done all I’ve thrown it it flawlessly. It cleans easy and I’m going to use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kohl

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: BISTEC EN CAZUELA CUBAN RECIPE I LOVE IT ,, ITS SUPER EASY TO USE ,, AND COOK VERY FAST❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Lachinaloveu

customer_reviews.title: Great design - love the larger size and low profile!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love! Nice and large with small footprint. Cooks quickly and easily and heats evenly for my needs. So easy to clean. Nice to use on the countertop and keeps my range free of splatter when frying.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: Nice skillet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice upgrade after we had 2 from the store over the years. This one is sleek and the heat is even.
customer_reviews.author: mmmacicka

customer_reviews.title: Great electric skillet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our camper and easy to clean. Haven't had any issues with it. Gets got quickly and great size to use for different things.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Recinos

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice electric skillet. Easy to clean and nice sleek design.
customer_reviews.author: GR8FUL4U4

customer_reviews.title: Skillet
customer_reviews.text: Great electric skillet easy to clean. I would recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Coffeemanrr

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. Sometimes the bacon gets a little charred in one part and just cooked in another but for things that you stir it is great
customer_reviews.author: A. Bentz

customer_reviews.title: Nice but one caveat
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this skillet to a replace 35-year-old Faberware frypan for which I needed a new probe plug that is unavailable. This skillet does cook the food properly. However, when, using, need to be cautious because the outer top edges of the skillet I have get very hot- enough to make you pull away quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far, hope it lasts as long as previous unit
customer_reviews.author: Dawn R. Milford

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back, huge hole in the product box.
customer_reviews.text: Sent back, there was a whole in the box you could fit your arm through. The Amazon box it was packaged in was in perfect condition but I wasnt about to take a chance on seeing if this worked.
customer_reviews.author: BoSox4life!

product_meta.title: Presto National IND 06858 16" Slim Line Skillet Electric Inch, Black
product_meta.description: Roasts, fries, grills, stews, bakes, makes casseroles and one-dish meals. Luxurious tempered glass cover. Deluxe nonstick surface inside and out. Handy for every meal. Great for breakfast, lunch, dinner, and entertaining. Low profile design makes it ideal for buffet-style serving. Convenient! Big 16/inch pan has high sidewalls for extra cooking and serving capacity, plus it's more efficient than a range burner or over. Heavy cast aluminum pan is virtually warp-proof. Easy to clean. Fully immersible with the heat control removed. Control Master heat control maintains the desired temperature automatically. Tempered glass cover and stay cool handle allow easy access and visibility.
feature_bullets: Roasts, fries, grills, stews, bakes, makes casseroles and one-dish meals. Luxurious tempered glass cover. Deluxe nonstick surface inside and out
Handy for every meal. Great for breakfast, lunch, dinner, and entertaining. Low profile design makes it ideal for buffet-style serving
Convenient! Big 16/inch pan has high sidewalls for extra cooking and serving capacity, plus it's more efficient than a range burner or over. Heavy cast aluminum pan is virtually warp-proof
Fully immersible with the heat control removed. Control Master heat control maintains the desired temperature automatically
Tempered glass cover and stay cool handle allow easy access and visibility

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars321 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
